name: Hardcore Trivia (itch)
description:
Challenge your brains and have a fun time! Hardcore trivia offers questions for many needs. It's time to test your knowledge! 5 themes: All-Stars ice-hockey Quiz, Caribbean Flags Quiz, The Roman Empire Trivia, Solar System Trivia and General knowledge Quiz!

50 questions, 5 interesting themes!

PLAY ON SOLO MODE OR WITH FRIENDS

Play solo mode or invite friends to play! You can also arrange event for your friends and you can compete together.
Each question have 4 options, which only one is correct... Choose the correct one and you will be rewarded with a points! (Achievement coming on later updates).

GAME GETTING BIGGER

Current state of the game includes 50 questions and 5 themes. Each theme have 10 questions and 4 options.

Game currently include these challenging quizzes:

  • Caribbean Flag Quiz (10 questions)
  • All-Stars Ice-Hockey Quiz (10 questions)
  • Solar System Trivia (10 questions)
  • The Roman Empire Trivia (10 questions)
  • General Knowledge Quiz (10 questions)
EVERYONE CAN PLAY

Game is perfect for all ages.

EXCELLENT ALSO FOR COMPANIES AND SCHOOL CLUBS

Are you running a hobby club, history club, bar, pub or a Game Cafe? Hardcore Trivia offers questions for many needs. With a Commercial licence, you can arrange a new event easily for example in your bar and provide entertainment to the customers. Hardcore Trivia includes ready to print questionnaire forms which you can give to customers before the game stars, and your host can use easy interface to run the event. 



Tips running the game in Schools, Clubs, Bars, Restaurants and other societies:

1. Buy the Commercial Licence (available soon, separate purchase button or file labelled Commercial Licence).

Prepare everything ready for the audience:

1. Print questionnaire forms and give pencil and forms to customer/members
2. Introduce the game to the host. After your host has get familiar with the game easy interface, host is ready to start the game and pick audience desired category.
3. When game ends, you collect questionnaires from the customers and calculate the points (you can see the correct answers by downloading form named Correct answers.
4. We have a winner! Time for lottery?

Note that non-commercial licence have automated points calculation system, which is not usually suitable for events arranged to large audience.
